Multiselection Dropdown

Making multiselection dropdown with search functionality was never so easy before webready pluging library. Usign webready library you can easily implement multiselection dropdown on your website with minimal code written and without depending on other libraries(eg: JQuery, angularjs, vuejs etc).

Demo:
Steps to use in your website
  • 1. Download webready plugins files - plugins.js and plugins.css from here
  • 2. Attach file path to your web page.
  • 3. Use below code to call plugin.
